website_summaries.verdict: Quickly turn your KitchenAid stand mixer into a multi-purpose kitchen tool with this variety pack.
pros: Attachments fit all household KitchenAid stand mixers
Comes with a variety of attachments at a reasonable price point
Durable plastic attachments are dishwasher safe
Slices hard vegetables in seconds and grinds meats quickly and efficiently
cons: Some vegetables such as beets or carrots will stain the white attachment

customer_reviews.title: Does great job. Well made
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to use. I shredded carrots and the result was much better than my food processor. The carrots were shredded when they come out more pulverized in the food processor. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 is because the carrots stained the inside Of the housing even though I washed it immediately. Takes up a lot less room than the food processor and is easier to clean. Some reviews complained about the quality and that some parts were plastic. Though there is plastic, it is sturdy and I think it will function well. New plastics can be as durable as metal. I found nothing cheap or flimsy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Punishing myself for not buying sooner
customer_reviews.text: I go through so much shredded cheese since i started keto, been shredding it buy hand for so long it sucked. this is so much easier and faster, plus it great for making riced cauliflower, shredded cucumber or zucchini
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D.

customer_reviews.title: Can be used by husbands that want to help in the kitchen, but are usually in the way.
customer_reviews.text: The attachment to grind meat was actually really easy to use. My hubby was able to operate it without my help. 😀 I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: US Person of Interest

customer_reviews.title: Works great I've made 18 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Works great I've made 18 lbs. Of Turkey salad and 20 lbs of ham salad so far with out a single problem.
customer_reviews.author: Shane E. Christener

customer_reviews.title: a great addition to the mixer
customer_reviews.text: a great addition to the mixer. the slicer/grater is a bit larger than it looked making it even more useful.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H.

customer_reviews.title: I have not used it a great deal but so far it has performed well and ...
customer_reviews.text: This equipment arrived on time and was packaged well. I have not used it a great deal but so far it has performed well and cleans easily. The blade is not nearly what my old hand crank machine was and I am not too sure just how well it does hash brown potatoes however this may be a "learning curve" problem on my part. Given that this is a Kitchen Aid product I am willing to give it a bit of time and see how it goes. Of all the Kitchen Aid equipment I have purchased I haven't found any that was shoddy nor a disappointment .
customer_reviews.author: joe davis

customer_reviews.title: Struggled grinding 3 lbs of cut up chuck roast.
customer_reviews.text: I used it once to grind 3 1/3 lbs of chopped up chuck roast. It clogged up at least 3-4 times. Couldn't handle this simple task.
customer_reviews.author: RonD

customer_reviews.title: Both work fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Food grinder: Used this to grind turkey, and it was actually fun to perform the grinding, incredibly simple to set up. Cleaning the attachments took a little while though since you don't want raw meat hiding in the crevices, but it cleaned up nicely. Food Processor: THIS IS AMAZING!!!! Easy to use and clean, enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great attachments
customer_reviews.text: Received these attachments for Christmas and I just love them. I was surprised at the weight of the items (heavy and well made). I highly recommend these. And I was also pleased with the delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: Wife of Jud

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: How have I lived without this?! The cheese grater has been life changing. I have always hated grating cheese but now I spend a few minutes every Sunday grating cheese I'll need for the week, and the whole process takes me at most 5mins. I have yet to use the grinder attachment but if it is anything like the cheese grater then I'm sure it will be just as life altering. The product its self is well made and definitely looks and feels like it will be around for many years. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A_N

customer_reviews.title: nice that it attached to stand mixer
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok.... nice that it attached to stand mixer. Slices very thin, not entirely neatly... shreds ok. Weird design to shoot out food. Felt stable, but not for tomatoes or onions, or most vegetables. Have not tried meat grinder yet. Wish I got the food processor with dicer instead. If it comes free or is way marked down, not worth at full price.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget combo!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need it to do. I like that I can run the mixer and grate or slice at the same time! Makes quick work and you can control the speed with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Jette Porrazzo

customer_reviews.title: Total hit for someone who owns a KitchenAid stand mixer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a Christmas gift for someone who owns a KitchenAid stand mixer and who loves to cook. It was a huge hit! The grinder in particular is so useful for so many recipes, and it means that the meat being used in those recipes are much healthier than the ground meat purchased in stores (which have a higher fat content). It's also one of those gifts that just keep on giving because they last so long and can be used with so many different varieties of good. The giftee was very pleased with the set, and I got to witness first hand the magic of the expanded uses of the KitchenAid.
customer_reviews.author: Misty321

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: kind of a pain... while using either one of these you kind of have to scrape the stuff out as it chops it otherwise you just end up with a big blob of cheese or cucumbers or whatever it is your slicing. simple enough to clean though. we got it on sale so cant complain about the price too much.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Meat grinder doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: The meat grinder attachment is either defective or a knockoff. It doesn’t fit all the way into the machine because the metal is too wide at the top of the attachment. It scraped my machine up and manufacturer has been unresponsive.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli HTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but seems to cause a lot of waste
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few weeks now. I mainly use it to grate zucchini to add to recipes and baked goods. Very easy to use and works very well but has caused me to end up with a strip of zucchini that just won't grate thru. I then cut it up by hand to avoid food waste but find that aspect a little frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about how easy this makes prep in the kitchen. Plus it's so nice having one appliance to replace the clutter. You can get rid of so many things that take up large amounts of space. The attachments, like this one, take up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: Maenna

customer_reviews.title: get it!
customer_reviews.text: We make our own dog food and I have senior dog that is missing lots of teeth. This helps so much the only complaint I have is why didn't I get this sooner!! We have used it for all kinds of meat, cheeses, cucumbers, egg shells, and more. If it is too wet it will splatter a bit but not a big deal. So worth the money for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Worst $$ I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used the slicer but I am very disappointed. Not at all what I expected. We tried cheese and sausage. Followed the directions to a tee, and it pretty much turned it into ground meat and cheese. We then tried multiple different settings with the same outcome. I decided maybe they were too soft and I'd try slicing potatoes instead. My original thoughts for this product were it would be great when I am making scalloped potatoes but it slices so thin the only possible outcome is potato chips. Hopefully I am more pleased with the shredder and grinder when I finally get around to using them :(
customer_reviews.author: WJG

customer_reviews.title: Get the metal grinder. Plastic is flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me the attachments for my KitchenAid for Christmas a couple years ago. I like them all. I do wish we would have purchased the grinder in metal. The plastic housing is a bit flimsy for grinding meat. It's definitely not for commercial use.
customer_reviews.author: Kent & Julie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for this package! All of the attachments work great
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Specifically wanted to have this for the grinder attachment. It is great! Haven't used the vegetable grater/slicer yet, but it looks pretty easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that my girlfriend was very happy and we have put it to good use several times already. A good stand mixer beats a handheld mixer in so may ways, especially with the addition of a few attachments. If you really enjoy cooking and baking and get frustrated by poorly built, cut rate kitchen products then this is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: works great -
customer_reviews.text: making homemade ground meat- just the right size for part time use - keep the meat semi-frozen before grinding - great product so far..
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Must have kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: I hate cooking, but this thing is amazing. I'll leave it to others that like cooking to assess the intricacies, as I'm not qualified.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Long

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: This is something my son and I have been wanting for quite a while. A mixer that does it all. It makes great cakes, grinds cabbage for slaw and does a thousand things. And so far it does them well. We are rally enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a gift -- where has it been my whole life?
customer_reviews.text: We all know these stand mixers are great. I feel like it needs no introduction. I just wish I'd bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: Where has my kitchen aid been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I love my kitchen aid and all the attachments. We especially love the meat grinder. You have not had good ground beef until you grind it yourself. I would buy it again and recommend these attachments to my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Bonita G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the avarge home cooking
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the avarge home cooking. Did some burgers, sausages and cutting salat - great results. Only down side is the sausage stuffer, it's a two men job cause of the height of the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Look for sales!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet (will update review when I do. But I got it for a great price and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Richardsdaughter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: wife has been wanting one of some time now. works great, she uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I thought that the slicer would be thicker slices. Other than that it works great
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this attachment set for the meat grinder. We have made ground chicken many times and thesetup and clean up are super easy. We will be experimenting with making our own sausage when we can find the time. Would recommend to anyone with a KitchenAid.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: blades are dull
customer_reviews.text: Blades are dull. Company replaced mine with another set of dull blades.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: It was is to put together, it made a little more of a mess I would like. You have to make sure to clean thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: miguel rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Grating Cheese
customer_reviews.text: jams up when grating cheese, and very difficult to remove and clean. Cone shaped food processor attachment works much better.
customer_reviews.author: DeeGee

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid rocks
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift but I own the same set. I love mine so I bought this for another person.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene G Bethke

customer_reviews.title: top goods better than in Germany you can only recommend and very ...
customer_reviews.text: top goods better than in Germany you can only recommend and very fast delivery works great.
customer_reviews.author: Marco V.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and durability
customer_reviews.text: They all work well; and the very good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Stewart F Ross

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was described will be buying from the seller again
customer_reviews.author: Travis A Wehmeyer

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid attachments, great products.
customer_reviews.text: Are use my KitchenAid a lot. The attachments enable me to do more.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Christenseen

customer_reviews.title: Shredder attachment broke easily!!
customer_reviews.text: The feed tube on the shredder attachment broke off after only three months .
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Burks

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality. received 3 days ago
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the attachments. Seems to be good quality. received 3 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Cowles

customer_reviews.title: East to use!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and clean. We probably use it once a week. We use the meat grinder the most and have loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So glad I broke down and bought one. Shoulda done it sooner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall good quality, gets the job done, but wish they had more size options for the grater (finer grating).
customer_reviews.author: Yinny

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great all around. No regrets. Reputable KitchenAid equipment, suits a well-stocked kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a good gift
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect present for my parents! They loved it
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Perez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to use! Makes grating cheese so much easier! It works great and cleans easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bitz

customer_reviews.title: Quality KitchenAid Item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a birthday gift for my daughter who absolutely loves the KitchenAid mixer that she received as a Christmas gift. The attachments are well made and of good quality. I’m looking forward to seeing the hours of enjoyment she’ll get from using her attachments.
customer_reviews.author: MelodyO

customer_reviews.title: When inserting the mixer blades you need to push up and turn to lock in
customer_reviews.text: The weight of the mixer is heavy. But it works great.
customer_reviews.author: william w.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy !
customer_reviews.text: Thanks, I really happy with my product ! :) Is perfect what I need !
customer_reviews.author: laura jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got for my friend and the attachmwents are heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: Paul Henderson

customer_reviews.title: So far has been the best purchase. We shred tons of cheese
customer_reviews.text: So far has been the best purchase. We shred tons of cheese. The shredder holds up well and goes through a bunch of cheese blocks. Have not used the grinder yet so can not comment on that part.
customer_reviews.author: Vyomesh Patel

customer_reviews.title: Would love to have all of the mixer
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Would love to have all of the mixer attachments
customer_reviews.author: Lkq521

customer_reviews.title: but anticipate their use as helpful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the attachments as of yet, but anticipate their use as helpful and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine with the same attachments as this
customer_reviews.text: I had an electric cheese grater that I have used for 6+ years. It worked fine with the same attachments as this. My wife wants to down size the number of appliances we have floating around so I ordered this so we can get rid of my old grater. At first, I was apprehensive about attachments for my KitchenAid and WOW was I wrong. These attachments is well made (like the Ferrari of kitchen stuff) and sturdy. The grater has one large feed and a second that fits in the middle for smaller food and more control. Due to this purchase I am looking into more attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Varied uses for all attachments included.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 star except for the fact that when pushing the items in to grind, the plunger hits the auger and roughs up the edges. Do not push all the way through, however some veggies just fed themselves which was great. The mixer did need to be on the highest speed to accomplish grinding cucumbers with skins, however. It will be interesting to see how it works when grinding meet and making sausage. I will update this review later on when I have used more of the attachments included.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit Great Value
customer_reviews.text: REally good for the value considering the price of most Kitchenaid attachments. I was already familiar with the meat grinder attachment, so I know this works really good at grinding meat. The sausage stuffer works, but if you are doing a whole lot of sausage, I would suggest a manual stuffer because it will be much faster. The vegetable slicer is ok, but not the best for softer vegetables. I ran a bunch of tomatoes through the course die on the meat grinder, and had instant tomato sauce! Worked perfectly. I also shredded 26 cups of zucchini to freeze, and it worked flawlessly for that. Overall, I am impressed, and can't wait to make some small scale specialty sausages soon!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Wrong order received
customer_reviews.text: I order this product thinking that I would receive all the attachments in the photo but only received the meat grinder. It came packaged in bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome! A man here and I'm not Martha Stewart ...
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! A man here and I'm not Martha Stewart so you get the picture. Easy for me to do and endless ideas for food. Always get the protection plan on stuff like this. I mean I use it all the time. Something will break trust me!
customer_reviews.author: george moraza

customer_reviews.title: Making things easier
customer_reviews.text: this was one of the attachments I bought and I love it. Grinding up Pecans has never been easier. Clean up is a breeze. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: GERTIE F.

customer_reviews.title: ... a two pound block of cheese and it worked fantastic! Would recommend for sure
customer_reviews.text: Used it for shredding a two pound block of cheese and it worked fantastic! Would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Classic
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Classic, SO many uses. I got the white one and it looks great sitting on my counter. Have already used it to make cookies, pizza dough, bread, pasta (with the pasta making attachment, also worth it if you love carbo loading like we do), and my own GoMacro bars. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Allison M.

customer_reviews.title: Homemade!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for making homemade food - adding that extra love to the foods you are preparing. It's not so easy to clean - but it's not impossible either.
customer_reviews.author: C Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Love the attachments
customer_reviews.text: Love the attachments! Easy to clean and I already shredded many things. It will be a bit messy with a cucumber and the carrots stain the white insert but other then that it works awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brady

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised excellent quality and easy to use and clean up. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: mike close

customer_reviews.title: This is not meant to be used in a kitchen of any kind.
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this, I feel for you. It grinds a free pieces of cubed meat fine but do not confuse this for a meat grinder or sausage stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Works great !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the meat grinder and sure work well and very sturdy really good product
customer_reviews.author: Justin W Schuman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This kit works great I used it primarily for grinding sausage great kit for the price!
customer_reviews.author: bigbeardedbastard

customer_reviews.title: The most perfect mixer on the market
customer_reviews.text: Dont ever forget to purchase the attachments when you get your mixer. The mixer itself is wonderful, but with the attachments, it becomes a real workhorse. Almost nothing that cant be done easily and within minutes. This mixer just can be beat for almost any job that you put it to.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Kaufmann

customer_reviews.title: Pain to Assemble, But
customer_reviews.text: If using for large projects, like shredding several blocks of cheese or a dozen potatoes, then the trouble of assembly is worth it. For prepping dinner--what a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Able

customer_reviews.title: Good set to slice/shred
customer_reviews.text: These work well but it takes takes a little effort to if food occasionally sticks.
customer_reviews.author: yo

customer_reviews.title: Great Attachments
customer_reviews.text: The price was awesome and these attachments are great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mallow

customer_reviews.title: It delivers
customer_reviews.text: KitchenAid stand mixers are a good investment for the serious baker/cook. Bread! The dough hook is indispensable for making bread.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Townsend Palmer

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid attachment
customer_reviews.text: Great KitchenAid attachments for our mixer. If you are looking to make homemade sausage or pasta, then you need these!
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Malm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present and used it today to grind up some roast to make hamburgers and it worked awesome

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to use and comes appart easily for cleaning. Eats through a block of cheese in seconds and makes beautiful shredded cheeses.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set! Came in a box that hid what it was! Thank you for that!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can now grind chicken making my grocery bill even less

customer_reviews.title: but the shredder works great, and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the sausage grinder yet, but the shredder works great, and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Exactly what you would expect from Kitchen aid.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great mixer little overkill on size we needed but nice to have extra large one

customer_reviews.text: Bought this for gift to my wife, she loves it!!

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law loves this gift. They all work great.

customer_reviews.text: Love my attachments. They work great! Perfect match for a kitchen aid mixer. Real kitchen aid attachments.

customer_reviews.title: If you love homemade sausage, buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Second order of this product. This one was a gift for our son. We just love ours...

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter. She absolutely loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Meat grinder is wondeful we made homade saugage. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clark

customer_reviews.title: We enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy using this. Works well and so far it's pretty neat
customer_reviews.author: Britt R

customer_reviews.title: Quick service
customer_reviews.text: I was double shipped and no one will get back with me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Mullen

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if I'd buy these again if I could do it over.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I expected too much. The kitchen aid mixer itself is great. The attachment are expensive and only worth while If you are really doing a lot of mincing, grating etc. Since they need to be hand washed. The sausage suffer will probably not see a second use. Easier to use a piping bag. I like the mincer, but I may sell the others. I found the grater harder to use than a hand grater, and more difficult to clean. Hopefully this helps others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Working as a chef for 3 years before I was declared a MasterChef. The KitchenAid brand has always been on the top as a chef and in my personal life. I have been using KitchenAid Stand Mixers for over 50 years. They are made to last right here in the USA. And this just like aff of fhe mixers attachments are among the best. This is why I give all the KitchenAid devices I have 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Brock

customer_reviews.title: Bad made quality
customer_reviews.text: The meat grinder cannot be inserted into the machine. Don't question me please, I DID push it to the end.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin.C

customer_reviews.title: I bought this new and it was used...I am using it for the 1st time today
customer_reviews.text: I like this....their is no paper work on how to use this and the picture shows what looks like 3 chopper heads and only 2 in the box..
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a time saver! We did everything manually before we purchased this. Now that we have it, it saves us so much time. The meat grinder is awesome and is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Clawbennett

product_meta.title: KitchenAid KSMGSSA Mixer Attachment Pack, White
product_meta.description: Grind, slice and shred. The food grinder helps you grind raw meat for fresh burgers in minutes. Plus, the fresh prep slicer/shredder makes quick work of shredding cheeses and slicing a variety of fruits and vegetables. For everything you want to make. KitchenAid.
feature_bullets: Designed, engineered, and tested by KitchenAid
Attaches to power hub of your stand mixer and uses the power of the motor to run the attachment. Fits all household KitchenAid stand mixers.
Food grinder with fine plate for meats & coarse plate for firm vegetables & cheeses.
Sausage stuffer parts for the food grinder attachment to make sausages from scratch (requires KSMGSSA fga, included).
Blades and Pushers are only dishwasher safe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars472 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
